Title: Requires orders of protection to be served upon the attorney representing the respondent
Summary: Requires orders of protection and temporary orders of protection to be served upon the attorney representing the respondent; requires attorneys to accept service of such orders addressed to a client, and to provide notice thereof and the terms therein to the client.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the criminal procedure law, in relation to requiring the service of temporary orders of protection and orders of protection upon the attorney representing the respondent or defendant
